item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: transforme
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

What is Zultys

Zultys is a Business Phone system that has many features, is powerful; efficient for the price. It is the best value Business Phone system in the industry today. It does so much more from a single box unit and without the need for any external servers (as it is the case with many of our competitors). Features like Automatic Call Distribution, Text to Speech, Advanced Voice Mail, Find me/Follow me, Integrated Voice Response, Call centre features , Call Recording and more are Integrated and run within the Zultys system. Further to this Zultys has a Session Border Controller (SBC) built-in which allows for external services and Teleworkers devices seamless connectivity. The SBC is included as standard and requires no extra license. This is a true "All In One Box" solution which makes the deployment and maintenance of the system simple. Combined with an elegant and easy to use administrative console interface, single or multi site installations can be completed in a quarter of the time, when compared to our competitors. We do more with less: faster, better, simpler and provide greater value. Zultys also has a software CTI (Computer Telephony Interface) which is supported on Windows, MAC and Linux. The CTI is called MXIE which is simple to install, easy to use and can improve the productivity of users. MXIE can be deployed to remote users anywhere and does not require a VPN connection. Zultys come in two models, MX30 and MX250. What is Zultys

Zultys is a Business Phone system that has many features, is powerful; efficient for the price. It is the best value Business Phone system in the industry today. It does so much more from a single box unit and without the need for any external servers (as it is the case with many of our competitors). Features like Automatic Call Distribution, Text to Speech, Advanced Voice Mail, Find me/Follow me, Integrated Voice Response, Call centre features , Call Recording and more are Integrated and run within the Zultys system. Further to this Zultys has a Session Border Controller (SBC) built-in which allows for external services and Teleworkers devices seamless connectivity. The SBC is included as standard and requires no extra license. This is a true "All In One Box" solution which makes the deployment and maintenance of the system simple. Combined with an elegant and easy to use administrative console interface, single or multi site installations can be completed in a quarter of the time, when compared to our competitors. We do more with less: faster, better, simpler and provide greater value. Zultys also has a software CTI (Computer Telephony Interface) which is supported on Windows, MAC and Linux. The CTI is called MXIE which is simple to install, easy to use and can improve the productivity of users. MXIE can be deployed to remote users anywhere and does not require a VPN connection. Zultys come in two models, MX30 and MX250. Below is a comparison of both models.";s:13:"pl_area_class";s:9:"ce-header";}s:6:"zpdziy";a:10:{s:10:"ibox_count";s:1:"2";s:9:"ibox_cols";s:1:"6";s:10:"ibox_media";s:5:"image";s:11:"ibox_format";s:3:"top";s:12:"ibox_image_1";s:27:"http://placehold.it/350x350";s:12:"ibox_image_2";s:27:"http://placehold.it/350x350";s:12:"ibox_title_1";s:4:"MX30";s:12:"ibox_title_2";s:5:"MX250";s:11:"ibox_text_1";s:41:"For small businesses with a few handsets.";s:11:"ibox_text_2";s:50:"For medium businesses with a few hundred handsets.";}s:6:"mnox09";a:1:{s:15:"textbox_content";s:4866:"
